help.descr:
Plot the union of polyhedra up to dimension three.
Figure properties, such as color, line width, etc, can be specified with "Property" - "Value" pairs.

input.name: U
input.descr: PolyUnion object that contains polyhedra in the same dimension.

class.name: char
class.descr: The color of the plot specified by real RGB vector or a string name of the color (e.g. 'gray');
Highlight or not the edges of the set. Default is false.
Specify the type of the line to plot edges of the set. Accepted values are '-',':','-.','--', and'none'.
Specify the width of the line. Default is 1.
Transparency of the color. The value must be inside [0,1] interval. Default is 1.
Type of markings to use. Allowed values are ".", "o", "x", "+", "*", "s", "d", "v", "\^", "<", ">", "p", "h" or "none". Default is "none".
The size of the marker. Default is 6.

example.descr: Plot union of three polyhedra in 2D.
Create non-overlapping union, full-dimensional and bounded
Plot the union with 0.4 transparency and the lines in width 2.
